name: Michael's Basics the full version (REUPLOADED)
description:
Michael's Basics the full version is a scrapped decompiled mod made by michaeldoesgaming. The only Reuploads are the Windows 64bit versions because I don't have mac and Windows 32bit.

Michael's Basics the full version was scrapped because of code used from other mods and also because MichaelDoesGaming told me it looks to much like a rip-off to Baldi's Basics Plus.  

There was a upcoming update 1.3 but scrapped for Michael's teachings in spelling and technology.

I had full permission from Michael to re-upload these remaining versions of the full version.

Credit's

Porky Powers- Reuploaded these versions

MichaelDoesGaming- Made the full version

I don't know who Michael Credited LOL.
